content: These factors include uncertainties as to the impact from the COVID-19, including the 2022 outbreaks in China; Russian war with Ukraine including any related international trade restrictions along with continued reopening and recovery efforts within the relevant global supply chains and among our customer base, levels of orders for the company and the activity level of the automotive and semiconductor industry overall; ability to record revenues based on the timing of product deliveries and installations; market acceptance of new products; changes in economic conditions and market demand; part shortages; pricing and other activities by competitors; and other risks, including those described from time-to-time in the company's filings on Forms 10-K and 10-Q with the Securities and Exchange Commission, press releases, and other communications.
